page.title: 13Farming arable/conservation
page.content:
Arable crops, The farms grain crops are {barley,oats}and{wheat.} They harvested them with two combine harvesters. The grain is kept in stores which can hold upto 100tons of grain each.The farming vehicles used are made by{Claas} and the tractors are{Fords.}The machinery includes ploughs, harrows, seed drills ,crop sprayers and combine harvesters.
Conservation on the farm, { Six thousand trees have been planted to conserve surroundings, they include Elm,Oak and Conifer. Some Elm trees still die of {Dutch elm }disease. Also,{hedges} have been left to grow. In corners of some fields little spinneys contain trees. The spinneys and trees are habitats for wild animals and birds. Mr Roper is in the{National Farmers Union.
